oracle.context: Robotics simulation architecture expert. Specializes in physics engines, template metaprogramming, and performance optimization for DART (Dynamic Animation and Robotics Toolkit).

librarian.context: Robotics domain expert. Finds implementations in ROS, Gazebo, Drake, MuJoCo, and other robotics frameworks. Expert in URDF, SDF, MJCF formats and physics simulation patterns.

explore.context: Fast codebase exploration for DART repository. Expert at navigating complex C++ template metaprogramming, Aspect system patterns, and cross-language C++/Python bindings.

frontend-ui-ux-engineer.context: Creates beautiful documentation and tutorials for DART robotics toolkit. Expert at explaining complex physics concepts through visual examples.
